title: Bosch 36" Stainless Steel 4-Door Counter Depth French Door Refrigerator - B21CL81SNS
description:
Bosch 36" Stainless Steel 4-Door Counter Depth French Door Refrigerator - B21CL81SNS

The 4-Door Counter-Depth Refrigerator features better freezer access, extra-cold storage & humidity controlled drawers to keep food fresh.

Features:

2-drawer freezer provides better organization and access to food.

A full-width Chiller Drawer provides extra-cold storage.

A retractable shelf allows you to easily store tall bottles and items.

Dual AirCool system provides even temperatures & minimal odor transfer.

Humidity controlled crisper drawers help keep food fresher longer



Specifications:

Capacity

Total unit gross capacity (cu. ft.) – AHAM: 20.7

Refrigerator gross capacity (cu. ft.): 14.7

Freezer gross capacity (cu. ft.): 6.0



General Properties

Water filter: No

Lighting: LED

Defrost process refrigerator section: Frost-free

Number of shelves: 5

Adjustable shelves: 4 half-width

Shelf material: Tempered glass

Type of shelves: Tempered glass

Gallon storage bins: 5

Humidity control drawer: 2

Defrost process freezer section: Automatic

Number of freezer drawers: 2

Ice maker: Yes



Technical Details

Current (A): 10 A

Volts (V): 120 V

Frequency (Hz): 60 Hz

Power cord length (in.): 67

Plug type: 120V-3 prong



Efficiency

Energy consumption (kWh/yr): 623 kWh



Accessories

Included: 2 Egg Trays, Ice scoop, Toe kick trim cover



Approximate Dimensions:

Height: 69-7/8"

Width: 35-3/4"

Depth: 28-3/4"

Cutout: Height: 70"

Width: 36"

Depth: 25"







Approximate Weight:

Shipping: 301.76 lbs
